text: @RiverActionUK @rosamundi @EnvAgency @itvnews @watsonchas @thenoblefoods Great to hear @itvnews has run this. From what I‚Äôve heard, the story of what‚Äôs happened to one of our most beautiful & important rivers should be a national scandal - an appalling failure of the @EnvAgency to protect even the best of our habitats. The boat needs to be rocked.
